title.raw: 《韓長孺列傳》 Biography of Han Changru

sentences.zh: 御史大夫韓安國者，梁成安人也，後徙睢陽。

translations.literal: Yu shi da fu Han An guo zhe, Liang Cheng an ren ye, hou xu Sui yang.
translations.idiomatic: Imperial censor Han Anguo, Liang Cheng'an person, later moved Suiyang.

sentences.zh: 嘗受韓子、雜家說於騶田生所。

translations.literal: Chang shou Han zi, za jia shuo yu Zou Tian sheng suo.
translations.idiomatic: Once received Hanzi, miscellaneous learning from Zou Tiansheng place.

sentences.zh: 事梁孝王為中大夫。

translations.literal: Shi Liang Xiao wang wei zhong da fu.
translations.idiomatic: Served Liang Xiao wang as central grand master.

sentences.zh: 吳楚反時，孝王使安國及張羽為將，捍吳兵於東界。

translations.literal: Wu Chu fan shi, Xiao wang shi An guo ji Zhang Yu wei jiang, han Wu bing yu dong jie.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Chu rebellion time, Xiao wang sent Anguo and Zhang Yu as generals, defended Wu troops at eastern border.

sentences.zh: 張羽力戰，安國持重，以故吳不能過梁。

translations.literal: Zhang Yu li zhan, An guo chi zhong, yi gu Wu bu neng guo Liang.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Yu vigorously fought, Anguo held steady, therefore Wu could not pass Liang.

sentences.zh: 吳楚已破，安國、張羽名由此顯。

translations.literal: Wu Chu yi po, An guo, Zhang Yu ming you ci xian.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Chu already broken, Anguo, Zhang Yu fame from this prominent.

sentences.zh: 梁孝王，景帝母弟，竇太后愛之，令得自請置相、二千石，出入游戲，僭於天子。

translations.literal: Liang Xiao wang, Jing di mu di, Dou tai hou ai zhi, ling de zi qing zhi xiang, er qian shi, chu ru you xi, jian yu tian zi.
translations.idiomatic: Liang Xiao wang, Emperor Jing younger brother, Empress Dowager Dou loved him, ordered got self request appoint chancellor, two thousand shi, enter leave play games, exceeded emperor.

sentences.zh: 天子聞之，心弗善也。

translations.literal: Tian zi wen zhi, xin fu shan ye.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor heard it, heart not good.

sentences.zh: 太后知帝不善，乃怒梁使者，弗見，案責王所為。

translations.literal: Tai hou zhi di bu shan, nai nu Liang shi zhe, fu jian, an ze wang suo wei.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager knew emperor not good, then angered Liang envoys, not saw, examined blamed wang conduct.

sentences.zh: 韓安國為梁使，見大長公主而泣曰：「何梁王為人子之孝，為人臣之忠，太后曾弗省也？

translations.literal: Han An guo wei Liang shi, jian da zhang gong zhu er qi yue: "He Liang wang wei ren zi zhi xiao, wei ren chen zhi zhong, tai hou ceng fu xing ye?
translations.idiomatic: Han Anguo as Liang envoy, saw grand princess and wept: "Why Liang wang conduct filial piety as son, conduct loyalty as subject, empress dowager once not consider?

sentences.zh: 夫前日吳、楚、齊、趙七國反時，自關以東皆合從西鄉，惟梁最親為艱難。

translations.literal: Fu qian ri Wu, Chu, Qi, Zhao qi guo fan shi, zi guan yi dong jie he cong xi xiang, wei Liang zui qin wei jian nan.
translations.idiomatic: Because previous Wu, Chu, Qi, Zhao seven kingdoms rebellion time, from pass eastward all united following west direction, only Liang most intimate for difficulties.

sentences.zh: 梁王念太后、帝在中，而諸侯擾亂，一言泣數行下，跪送臣等六人，將兵擊卻吳楚，吳楚以故兵不敢西，而卒破亡，梁王之力也。

translations.literal: Liang wang nian tai hou, di zai zhong, er zhu hou rao luan, yi yan qi shu xing xia, gui song chen deng liu ren, jiang bing ji que Wu Chu, Wu Chu yi gu bing bu gan xi, er zu po wang, Liang wang zhi li ye.
translations.idiomatic: Liang wang thought empress dowager, emperor in center, but feudal lords disturbance chaos, one word wept several rows down, knelt sent us six people, led troops repelled Wu Chu, Wu Chu therefore troops not dared west, and finally broken perished, Liang wang effort.

sentences.zh: 今太后以小睗苛禮責望梁王。

translations.literal: Jin tai hou yi xiao xin ke li ze wang Liang wang.
translations.idiomatic: Now empress dowager with small suspicion harsh etiquette blamed expected Liang wang.

sentences.zh: 梁王父兄皆帝王，所見者大，故出稱蹕，入言警，車旗皆帝所賜也，即欲以侘鄙縣，驅馳國中，以夸諸侯，令天下盡知太后、帝愛之也。

translations.literal: Liang wang fu xiong jie di wang, suo jian zhe da, gu chu cheng bi, ru yan jing, che qi jie di suo ci ye, ji yu yi cha bi xian, qu chi guo zhong, yi kua zhu hou, ling tian xia jin zhi tai hou, di ai zhi ye.
translations.idiomatic: Liang wang father brothers all emperors, what saw great, therefore out used imperial way, enter spoke imperial alert, carriages banners all emperor granted, immediately wanted with lowly county, drive in country, to boast feudal lords, make realm all know empress dowager, emperor loved him.

sentences.zh: 今梁使來，輒案責之。

translations.literal: Jin Liang shi lai, zhe an ze zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Now Liang envoys come, immediately examined blamed them.

sentences.zh: 梁王恐，日夜涕泣思慕，不知所為。

translations.literal: Liang wang kong, ri ye ti qi si mu, bu zhi suo wei.
translations.idiomatic: Liang wang feared, day night wept thought longed, not knew what to do.

sentences.zh: 何梁王之為子孝，為臣忠，而太后弗恤也？」

translations.literal: He Liang wang zhi wei zi xiao, wei chen zhong, er tai hou fu xu ye?"
translations.idiomatic: Why Liang wang conduct filial as son, conduct loyal as subject, but empress dowager not cared?

sentences.zh: 大長公主具以告太后，太后喜曰：「為言之帝。」

translations.literal: Da zhang gong zhu ju yi gao tai hou, tai hou xi yue: "Wei yan zhi di."
translations.idiomatic: Grand princess completely to report empress dowager, empress dowager happy: "Will speak to emperor."

sentences.zh: 言之，帝心乃解，而免冠謝太后曰：「兄弟不能相教，乃為太后遺憂。」

translations.literal: Yan zhi, di xin nai jie, er mian guan xie tai hou yue: "Xiong di bu neng xiang jiao, nai wei tai hou yi you."
translations.idiomatic: Spoke it, emperor heart then resolved, moreover removed hat apologized empress dowager: "Brothers cannot mutually teach, moreover for empress dowager left worry."

sentences.zh: 悉見梁使，厚賜之。

translations.literal: Xi jian Liang shi, hou ci zhi.
translations.idiomatic: All saw Liang envoys, thickly granted them.

sentences.zh: 其後梁王益親驩。

translations.literal: Qi hou Liang wang yi qin huan.
translations.idiomatic: Its after Liang wang increasingly intimate close.

sentences.zh: 太后、長公主更賜安國可直千餘金。

translations.literal: Tai hou, zhang gong zhu geng ci An guo ke zhi qian yu jin.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager, grand princess moreover granted Anguo value thousand remainder gold.

sentences.zh: 名由此顯，結於漢。

translations.literal: Ming you ci xian, jie yu Han.
translations.idiomatic: Name from this prominent, attached to Han.

sentences.zh: 其後安國坐法抵罪，蒙獄吏田甲辱安國。

translations.literal: Qi hou An guo zuo fa di zui, meng yu li Tian Jia ru An guo.
translations.idiomatic: Its after Anguo sat law violated crime, endured prison official Tian Jia insulted Anguo.

sentences.zh: 安國曰：「死灰獨不復然乎？」

translations.literal: An guo yue: "Si hui du bu fu ran hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Anguo said: "Dead ashes alone not again burn?"

sentences.zh: 田甲曰：「然即溺之。」

translations.literal: Tian Jia yue: "Ran ji ni zhi."
translations.idiomatic: Tian Jia said: "Burn then drown it."

sentences.zh: 居無何，梁內史缺，漢使使者拜安國為梁內史，起徒中為二千石。

translations.literal: Ju wu he, Liang nei shi que, Han shi shi zhe bai An guo wei Liang nei shi, qi tu zhong wei er qian shi.
translations.idiomatic: Resided no long, Liang internal affairs vacant, Han sent envoy appointed Anguo as Liang internal affairs, rose from prisoner became two thousand shi.

sentences.zh: 田甲亡走。

translations.literal: Tian Jia wang zou.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Jia fled ran.

sentences.zh: 安國曰：「甲不就官，我滅而宗。」

translations.literal: An guo yue: "Jia bu jiu guan, wo mie er zong."
translations.idiomatic: Anguo said: "Jia not go office, I extinguish your clan."

sentences.zh: 甲因肉袒謝。

translations.literal: Jia yin rou tan xie.
translations.idiomatic: Jia therefore bared flesh apologized.

sentences.zh: 安國笑曰：「可溺矣！

translations.literal: An guo xiao yue: "Ke ni yi!
translations.idiomatic: Anguo laughed: "Can drown!

sentences.zh: 公等足與治乎？」

translations.literal: Gong deng zu yu zhi hu?"
translations.idiomatic: You all sufficient with govern?"

sentences.zh: 卒善遇之。

translations.literal: Zu shan yu zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Finally well treated him.

sentences.zh: 梁內史之缺也，孝王新得齊人公孫詭，說之，欲請以為內史。

translations.literal: Liang nei shi zhi que ye, Xiao wang xin de Qi ren Gong sun gui, shuo zhi, yu qing yi wei nei shi.
translations.idiomatic: Liang internal affairs vacancy, Xiao wang newly got Qi person Gongsun Gui, persuaded him, wanted request appoint as internal affairs.

sentences.zh: 竇太后聞，乃詔王以安國為內史。

translations.literal: Dou tai hou wen, nai zhao wang yi An guo wei nei shi.
translations.idiomatic: Dou empress dowager heard, then decreed wang with Anguo as internal affairs.

sentences.zh: 公孫詭、羊勝說孝王求為帝太子及益地事，恐漢大臣不聽，乃陰使人刺漢用事謀臣。

translations.literal: Gong sun gui, Yang Sheng shuo Xiao wang qiu wei di tai zi ji yi di shi, kong Han da chen bu ting, nai yin shi ren ci Han yong shi mou chen.
translations.idiomatic: Gongsun Gui, Yang Sheng persuaded Xiao wang seek be emperor crown prince and increase territory matters, feared Han great ministers not listen, then secretly sent people assassinated Han in power plotting ministers.

sentences.zh: 及殺故吳相袁盎，景帝遂聞詭、勝等計畫，乃遣使捕詭、勝，必得。

translations.literal: Ji sha gu Wu xiang Yuan Ang, Jing di sui wen gui, Sheng deng ji hua, nai qian shi bu gui, Sheng, bi de.
translations.idiomatic: And killed former Wu chancellor Yuan Ang, Emperor Jing then heard Gui, Sheng etc. plans, then sent envoys arrest Gui, Sheng, must obtain.

sentences.zh: 漢使十輩至梁，相以下舉國大索，月餘不得。

translations.literal: Han shi shi bei zhi Liang, xiang yi xia ju guo da suo, yue yu bu de.
translations.idiomatic: Han sent ten groups to Liang, chancellor below mobilized whole country great search, month remainder not obtained.

sentences.zh: 內史安國聞詭、勝匿孝王所，安國入見王而泣曰：「主辱臣死。

translations.literal: Nei shi An guo wen gui, Sheng ni Xiao wang suo, An guo ru jian wang er qi yue: "Zhu ru chen si.
translations.idiomatic: Internal affairs Anguo heard Gui, Sheng hid Xiao wang place, Anguo entered saw wang and wept: "Lord disgraced subject dies.

sentences.zh: 大王無良臣，故事紛紛至此。

translations.literal: Da wang wu liang chen, gu shi fen fen zhi ci.
translations.idiomatic: Great wang without good ministers, therefore matters confused to this.

sentences.zh: 今詭、勝不得，請辭賜死。」

translations.literal: Jin gui, Sheng bu de, qing ci ci si."
translations.idiomatic: Now Gui, Sheng not obtained, please resign grant death."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「何至此？」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "He zhi ci?"
translations.idiomatic: Wang said: "Why to this?"

sentences.zh: 安國泣數行下，曰：「大王自度於皇帝，孰與太上皇之與高皇帝及皇帝之與臨江王親？」

translations.literal: An guo qi shu xing xia, yue: "Da wang zi duo yu huang di, shu yu tai shang huang zhi yu gao huang di ji huang di zhi yu Lin jiang wang qin?"
translations.idiomatic: Anguo wept several rows down, said: "Great wang self measure with emperor, who with Taishang emperor relation Gao emperor and emperor relation Linjiang wang close?"

sentences.zh: 孝王曰：「弗如也。」

translations.literal: Xiao wang yue: "Fu ru ye."
translations.idiomatic: Xiao wang said: "Not like."

sentences.zh: 安國曰：「夫太上、臨江親父子之閒，然而高帝曰『提三尺劍取天下者朕也』，故太上皇終不得制事，居于櫟陽。

translations.literal: An guo yue: "Fu tai shang, Lin jiang qin fu zi zhi jian, ran er gao di yue "ti san chi jian qu tian xia zhe zhen ye", gu tai shang huang zhong bu de zhi shi, ju yu Que yang.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo said: "Because Taishang, Linjiang close father son between, but Gao emperor said "raised three chi sword took realm I", therefore Taishang emperor finally not got control matters, resided in Queyang.

sentences.zh: 臨江王，適長太子也，以一言過，廢王臨江；

translations.literal: Lin jiang wang, shi zhang tai zi ye, yi yi yan guo, fei wang Lin jiang;
translations.idiomatic: Linjiang wang, legitimate eldest crown prince, with one word mistake, deposed wang Linjiang;

sentences.zh: 用宮垣事，卒自殺中尉府。

translations.literal: Yong gong yuan shi, zu zi sha zhong wei fu.
translations.idiomatic: Used palace wall matter, finally suicide in commandants office.

sentences.zh: 何者？

translations.literal: He zhe?
translations.idiomatic: Why?

sentences.zh: 治天下終不以私亂公。

translations.literal: Zhi tian xia zhong bu yi si luan gong.
translations.idiomatic: Governing realm finally not with private confuse public.

sentences.zh: 語曰：『雖有親父，安知其不為虎？

translations.literal: Yu yue: "Sui you qin fu, an zhi qi bu wei hu?
translations.idiomatic: Proverb says: "Though have close father, how know he not become tiger?

sentences.zh: 雖有親兄，安知其不為狼？』

translations.literal: Sui you qin xiong, an zhi qi bu wei lang?"
translations.idiomatic: Though have close brother, how know he not become wolf?"

sentences.zh: 今大王列在諸侯，悅一邪臣浮說，犯上禁，橈明法。

translations.literal: Jin da wang lie zai zhu hou, yue yi xie chen fu shuo, fan shang jin, nao ming fa.
translations.idiomatic: Now great wang ranked among feudal lords, pleased one wicked minister empty talk, violated emperor prohibition, bent clear law.

sentences.zh: 天子以太后故，不忍致法於王。

translations.literal: Tian zi yi tai hou gu, bu ren zhi fa yu wang.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor because empress dowager reason, not bear apply law to wang.

sentences.zh: 太后日夜涕泣，幸大王自改，而大王終不覺寤。

translations.literal: Tai hou ri ye ti qi, xing da wang zi gai, er da wang zhong bu jue wu.
translations.idiomatic: Empress dowager day night wept, hoped great wang self change, but great wang finally not aware enlightened.

sentences.zh: 有如太后宮車即晏駕，大王尚誰攀乎？」

translations.literal: You ru tai hou gong che ji yan jia, da wang shang shui pan hu?"
translations.idiomatic: If like empress dowager palace carriage immediately evening drive, great wang still who cling?"

sentences.zh: 語未卒，孝王泣數行下，謝安國曰：「吾今出詭、勝。」

translations.literal: Yu wei zu, Xiao wang qi shu xing xia, xie An guo yue: "Wu jin chu gui, Sheng."
translations.idiomatic: Words not finished, Xiao wang wept several rows down, thanked Anguo: "I now out Gui, Sheng."

sentences.zh: 詭、勝自殺。

translations.literal: Gui, Sheng zi sha.
translations.idiomatic: Gui, Sheng suicide.

sentences.zh: 漢使還報，梁事皆得釋，安國之力也。

translations.literal: Han shi huan bao, Liang shi jie de shi, An guo zhi li ye.
translations.idiomatic: Han envoys returned report, Liang matters all got released, Anguo effort.

sentences.zh: 於是景帝、太后益重安國。

translations.literal: Yu shi Jing di, tai hou yi zhong An guo.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon Emperor Jing, empress dowager increasingly valued Anguo.

sentences.zh: 孝王卒，共王即位，安國坐法失官，居家。

translations.literal: Xiao wang zu, Gong wang ji wei, An guo zuo fa shi guan, ju jia.
translations.idiomatic: Xiao wang died, Gong wang ascended throne, Anguo sat law lost office, resided home.

sentences.zh: 建元中，武安侯田蚡為漢太尉，親貴用事，安國以五百金物遺蚡。

translations.literal: Jian yuan zhong, Wu an hou Tian Fen wei Han tai wei, qin gui yong shi, An guo yi wu bai jin wu yi Fen.
translations.idiomatic: Jianyuan middle, Wuan marquis Tian Fen became Han commander, intimate noble in power, Anguo with five hundred gold objects gifted Fen.

sentences.zh: 蚡言安國太后，天子亦素聞其賢，即召以為北地都尉，遷為大司農。

translations.literal: Fen yan An guo tai hou, tian zi yi su wen qi xian, ji zhao yi wei bei di du wei, qian wei da si nong.
translations.idiomatic: Fen spoke Anguo to empress dowager, emperor also long heard his worthy, immediately summoned appointed as Beidi commandery governor, promoted to grand minister agriculture.

sentences.zh: 閩越、東越相攻，安國及大行王恢將。

translations.literal: Min Yue, Dong Yue xiang gong, An guo ji da xing Wang Hui jiang.
translations.idiomatic: Min Yue, Dong Yue mutually attacked, Anguo and grand traveler Wang Hui led.

sentences.zh: 未至越，越殺其王降，漢兵亦罷。

translations.literal: Wei zhi Yue, Yue sha qi wang xiang, Han bing yi ba.
translations.idiomatic: Not arrived Yue, Yue killed their wang surrendered, Han troops also dismissed.

sentences.zh: 建元六年，武安侯為丞相，安國為御史大夫。

translations.literal: Jian yuan liu nian, Wu an hou wei cheng xiang, An guo wei yu shi da fu.
translations.idiomatic: Jianyuan sixth year, Wuan marquis became chancellor, Anguo became imperial censor.

sentences.zh: 匈奴來請和親，天子下議。

translations.literal: Xiong nu lai qing he qin, tian zi xia yi.
translations.idiomatic: Xiongnu came request peaceful marriage alliance, emperor below discussed.

sentences.zh: 大行王恢，燕人也，數為邊吏，習知胡事。

translations.literal: Da xing Wang Hui, Yan ren ye, shu wei bian li, xi zhi Hu shi.
translations.idiomatic: Grand traveler Wang Hui, Yan person, repeatedly served border officials, familiar knew barbarian matters.

sentences.zh: 議曰：「漢與匈奴和親，率不過數歲即復倍約。

translations.literal: Yi yue: "Han yu Xiong nu he qin, lv bu guo shu sui ji fu bei yue.
translations.idiomatic: Discussed: "Han with Xiongnu peaceful marriage alliance, generally not pass several years then again break treaty.

sentences.zh: 不如勿許，興兵擊之。」

translations.literal: Bu ru wu xu, xing bing ji zhi."
translations.idiomatic: Not like not permit, raise troops attack them."

sentences.zh: 安國曰：「千里而戰，兵不獲利。

translations.literal: An guo yue: "Qian li er zhan, bing bu huo li.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo said: "Thousand li and battle, troops not obtain profit.

translations.literal: Jin Xiong nu fu Rong ma zhi zu, huai qin shou zhi xin, qian xi niao ju, nan de er zhi ye.
translations.idiomatic: Now Xiongnu rely on warhorse feet, harbor bird beast heart, migrate fly like birds, hard obtain and control.

sentences.zh: 得其地不足以為廣，有其眾不足以為彊，自上古不屬為人。

translations.idiomatic: Get their land insufficient to make broad, have their multitude insufficient to make strong, from ancient not belonged to people.

sentences.zh: 漢數千里爭利，則人馬罷，虜以全制其敝。

translations.literal: Han shu qian li zheng li, ze ren ma ba, lu yi quan zhi qi bi.
translations.idiomatic: Han several thousand li contend profit, then men horses tired, enemy with whole control their exhaustion.

sentences.zh: 且彊弩之極，矢不能穿魯縞；

translations.literal: Qie qiang nu zhi ji, shi bu neng chuan Lu gao;
translations.idiomatic: Moreover strong crossbow extreme, arrow cannot penetrate Lu silk;

translations.literal: Chong feng zhi mo, li bu neng piao hong mao.
translations.idiomatic: Charge wind end, force cannot drift swan feather.

sentences.zh: 非初不勁，末力衰也。

translations.literal: Fei chu bu jing, mo li shuai ye.
translations.idiomatic: Not initial not strong, end force decline.

sentences.zh: 擊之不便，不如和親。」

translations.literal: Ji zhi bu bian, bu ru he qin."
translations.idiomatic: Attack them inconvenient, not like peaceful marriage alliance."

translations.literal: Qun chen yi zhe duo fu An guo, yu shi shang xu he qin.
translations.idiomatic: Ministers discussing mostly attached Anguo, thereupon emperor permitted peaceful marriage alliance.

sentences.zh: 其明年，則元光元年，雁門馬邑豪聶翁壹因大行王恢言上曰：「匈奴初和親，親信邊，可誘以利。」

translations.literal: Qi ming nian, ze Yuan guang yuan nian, Yan men Ma yi hao Nie Weng Yi yin da xing Wang Hui yan shang yue: "Xiong nu chu he qin, qin xin bian, ke you yi li."
translations.idiomatic: Its next year, namely Yuanguang first year, Yanmen Maiyi hero Nie Wengyi through grand traveler Wang Hui spoke emperor: "Xiongnu initial peaceful marriage alliance, intimate trusted border, can lure with profit."

sentences.zh: 陰使聶翁壹為閒，亡入匈奴，謂單于曰：「吾能斬馬邑令丞吏，以城降，財物可盡得。」

translations.literal: Yin shi Nie Weng Yi wei jian, wang ru Xiong nu, wei chan yu yue: "Wu neng zhan Ma yi ling cheng li, yi cheng xiang, cai wu ke jin de."
translations.idiomatic: Secretly sent Nie Wengyi as spy, fled entered Xiongnu, told chanyu: "I can behead Maiyi magistrate deputy officials, with city surrender, wealth objects can all obtain."

sentences.zh: 單于愛信之，以為然，許聶翁壹。

translations.literal: Chan yu ai xin zhi, yi wei ran, xu Nie Weng Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu loved trusted him, considered correct, permitted Nie Wengyi.

sentences.zh: 聶翁壹乃還，詐斬死罪囚，縣其頭馬邑城，示單于使者為信。

translations.literal: Nie Weng Yi nai huan, zha zhan si zui qiu, xian qi tou Ma yi cheng, shi chan yu shi zhe wei xin.
translations.idiomatic: Nie Wengyi then returned, falsely beheaded death penalty prisoner, hung his head Maiyi city, showed chanyu envoy as proof.

sentences.zh: 曰：「馬邑長吏已死，可急來。」

translations.literal: Yue: "Ma yi zhang li yi si, ke ji lai."
translations.idiomatic: Said: "Maiyi chief officials already died, can urgently come."

sentences.zh: 於是單于穿塞將十餘萬騎，入武州塞。

translations.literal: Yu shi chan yu chuan sai jiang shi yu wan qi, ru Wu zhou sai.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon chanyu pierced pass led ten remainder ten thousand cavalry, entered Wuzhou pass.

sentences.zh: 當是時，漢伏兵車騎材官二十餘萬，匿馬邑旁谷中。

translations.literal: Dang shi shi, Han fu bing che qi cai guan er shi yu wan, ni Ma yi pang gu zhong.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, Han ambushed troops chariots cavalry material officials twenty remainder ten thousand, hid Maiyi side valley middle.

sentences.zh: 衛尉李廣為驍騎將軍，太仆公孫賀為輕車將軍，大行王恢為將屯將軍，太中大夫李息為材官將軍。

translations.literal: Wei wei Li Guang wei xiao qi jiang jun, tai pu Gong sun He wei qing che jiang jun, da xing Wang Hui wei jiang tun jiang jun, tai zhong da fu Li Xi wei cai guan jiang jun.
translations.idiomatic: Guard Wei Li Guang became fierce cavalry general, master carriages Gongsun He became light chariot general, grand traveler Wang Hui became army garrison general, palace grand master Li Xi became material official general.

sentences.zh: 御史大夫韓安國為護軍將軍，諸將皆屬護軍。

translations.literal: Yu shi da fu Han An guo wei hu jun jiang jun, zhu jiang jie shu hu jun.
translations.idiomatic: Imperial censor Han Anguo became protect army general, various generals all belonged protect army.

sentences.zh: 約單于入馬邑而漢兵縱發。

translations.literal: Yue chan yu ru Ma yi er Han bing zong fa.
translations.idiomatic: Agreed chanyu enter Maiyi and Han troops then launch.

sentences.zh: 王恢、李息、李廣別從代主擊其輜重。

translations.literal: Wang Hui, Li Xi, Li Guang bie cong Dai zhu ji qi zi zhong.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Hui, Li Xi, Li Guang separately from Dai command strike their baggage heavy.

sentences.zh: 於是單于入漢長城武州塞。

translations.literal: Yu shi chan yu ru Han chang cheng Wu zhou sai.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon chanyu entered Han Great Wall Wuzhou pass.

sentences.zh: 未至馬邑百餘里，行掠鹵，徒見畜牧於野，不見一人。

translations.literal: Wei zhi Ma yi bai yu li, xing lve lu, tu jian chu mu yu ye, bu jian yi ren.
translations.idiomatic: Not arrived Maiyi hundred remainder li, went plundering, only saw livestock pasturing in field, not saw one person.

sentences.zh: 單于怪之，攻烽燧，得武州尉史。

translations.literal: Chan yu guai zhi, gong feng sui, de Wu zhou wei shi.
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu wondered it, attacked beacon signal, obtained Wuzhou wei shi.

sentences.zh: 欲刺問尉史。

translations.literal: Yu ci wen wei shi.
translations.idiomatic: Wanted stab question wei shi.

sentences.zh: 尉史曰：「漢兵數十萬伏馬邑下。」

translations.literal: Wei shi yue: "Han bing shu shi wan fu Ma yi xia."
translations.idiomatic: Wei shi said: "Han troops several ten ten thousand ambush Maiyi below."

sentences.zh: 單于顧謂左右曰：「幾為漢所賣！」

translations.literal: Chan yu gu wei zuo you yue: "Ji wei Han suo mai!"
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu turned told left right: "Almost became Han sold!"

sentences.zh: 乃引兵還。

translations.literal: Nai yin bing huan.
translations.idiomatic: Then led troops return.

sentences.zh: 出塞，曰：「吾得尉史，乃天也。」

translations.literal: Chu sai, yue: "Wu de wei shi, nai tian ye."
translations.idiomatic: Out pass, said: "I obtained wei shi, namely heaven."

sentences.zh: 命尉史為「天王」。

translations.literal: Ming wei shi wei "Tian wang".
translations.idiomatic: Named wei shi as "Heaven wang".

sentences.zh: 塞下傳言單于已引去。

translations.literal: Sai xia chuan yan chan yu yi yin qu.
translations.idiomatic: Pass below transmitted words chanyu already led away.

sentences.zh: 漢兵追至塞，度弗及，即罷。

translations.literal: Han bing zhui zhi sai, duo fu ji, ji ba.
translations.idiomatic: Han troops pursued to pass, measured not reach, then dismissed.

sentences.zh: 王恢等兵三萬，聞單于不與漢合，度往擊輜重，必與單于精兵戰，漢兵勢必敗，則以便宜罷兵，皆無功。

translations.literal: Wang Hui deng bing san wan, wen chan yu bu yu Han he, duo wang ji zi zhong, bi yu chan yu jing bing zhan, Han bing shi bi bai, ze yi bian yi ba bing, jie wu gong.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Hui etc. troops three ten thousand, heard chanyu not with Han engage, measured go attack baggage heavy, must with chanyu elite troops battle, Han troops situation must defeat, then with discretion dismissed troops, all no merit.

sentences.zh: 天子怒王恢不出擊單于輜重，擅引兵罷也。

translations.literal: Tian zi nu Wang Hui bu chu ji chan yu zi zhong, shan yin bing ba ye.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor angered Wang Hui not out attack chanyu baggage heavy, arbitrarily led troops dismissed.

sentences.zh: 恢曰：「始約虜入馬邑城，兵與單于接，而臣擊其輜重，可得利。

translations.literal: Hui yue: "Shi yue lu ru Ma yi cheng, bing yu chan yu jie, er chen ji qi zi zhong, ke de li.
translations.idiomatic: Hui said: "Initial agreement enemy enter Maiyi city, troops with chanyu engage, and subject attack their baggage heavy, could obtain profit.

sentences.zh: 今單于聞，不至而還，臣以三萬人眾不敵，禔取辱耳。

translations.literal: Jin chan yu wen, bu zhi er huan, chen yi san wan ren zhong bu di, pi qu ru er.
translations.idiomatic: Now chanyu heard, not arrived and return, subject with three ten thousand people multitude not match, only take humiliation.

sentences.zh: 臣固知還而斬，然得完陛下士三萬人。」

translations.literal: Chen gu zhi huan er zhan, ran de wan bixia shi san wan ren."
translations.idiomatic: Subject firmly knew return and behead, but obtain complete your majesty soldiers three ten thousand people."

sentences.zh: 於是下恢廷尉。

translations.literal: Yu shi xia Hui ting wei.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon sent Hui to judicial court.

sentences.zh: 廷尉當恢逗橈，當斬。

translations.literal: Ting wei dang Hui dou nao, dang zhan.
translations.idiomatic: Judicial court judged Hui delayed obstructed, should behead.

sentences.zh: 恢私行千金丞相蚡。

translations.literal: Hui si xing qian jin cheng xiang Fen.
translations.idiomatic: Hui privately sent thousand gold chancellor Fen.

sentences.zh: 蚡不敢言上，而言於太后曰：「王恢首造馬邑事，今不成而誅恢，是為匈奴報仇也。」

translations.literal: Fen bu gan yan shang, er yan yu tai hou yue: "Wang Hui shou zao Ma yi shi, jin bu cheng er zhu Hui, shi wei Xiong nu bao chou ye."
translations.idiomatic: Fen not dared speak emperor, but spoke to empress dowager: "Wang Hui first created Maiyi matter, now not succeed and execute Hui, is for Xiongnu avenge."

sentences.zh: 上朝太后，太后以丞相言告上。

translations.literal: Shang chao tai hou, tai hou yi cheng xiang yan gao shang.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor court empress dowager, empress dowager with chancellor words told emperor.

sentences.zh: 上曰：「首為馬邑事者，恢也，故發天下兵數十萬，從其言，為此。

translations.literal: Shang yue: "Shou wei Ma yi shi zhe, Hui ye, gu fa tian xia bing shu shi wan, cong qi yan, wei ci.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "First for Maiyi matter, Hui, therefore sent realm troops several ten ten thousand, followed his words, for this.

sentences.zh: 且縱單于不可得，恢所部擊其輜重，猶頗可得，以慰士大夫心。

translations.literal: Qie zong chan yu bu ke de, Hui suo bu ji qi zi zhong, you po ke de, yi wei shi da fu xin.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover even chanyu cannot obtain, Hui his command attack their baggage heavy, still considerably can obtain, to comfort scholar officials heart.

sentences.zh: 今不誅恢，無以謝天下。」

translations.literal: Jin bu zhu Hui, wu yi xie tian xia."
translations.idiomatic: Now not execute Hui, nothing to apologize realm."

sentences.zh: 於是恢聞之，乃自殺。

translations.literal: Yu shi Hui wen zhi, nai zi sha.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon Hui heard it, then suicide.

sentences.zh: 安國為人多大略，智足以當世取合，而出於忠厚焉。

translations.literal: An guo wei ren duo da lve, zhi zu yi dang shi qu he, er chu yu zhong hou yan.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo as person much grand strategy, wisdom sufficient to match age obtain harmony, moreover came from loyal generous.

sentences.zh: 貪嗜於財。

translations.literal: Tan shi yu cai.
translations.idiomatic: Greedy fond of wealth.

sentences.zh: 所推舉皆廉士，賢於己者也。

translations.literal: Suo tui ju jie lian shi, xian yu ji zhe ye.
translations.idiomatic: What recommended all incorruptible scholars, worthy than himself.

sentences.zh: 於梁舉壺遂、臧固、郅他，皆天下名士，士亦以此稱慕之，唯天子以為國器。

translations.literal: Yu Liang ju Hu Sui, Zang Gu, Zhi Ta, jie tian xia ming shi, shi yi ci cheng mu zhi, wei tian zi yi wei guo qi.
translations.idiomatic: In Liang recommended Hu Sui, Zang Gu, Zhi Ta, all realm famous scholars, scholars also with this praised admired him, only emperor considered as state vessel.

sentences.zh: 安國為御史大夫四歲餘，丞相田蚡死，安國行丞相事，奉引墮車蹇。

translations.literal: An guo wei yu shi da fu si sui yu, cheng xiang Tian Fen si, An guo xing cheng xiang shi, feng yin duo che jian.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo became imperial censor four years remainder, chancellor Tian Fen died, Anguo acted chancellor matters, honored pulled carriage lame.

sentences.zh: 天子議置相，欲用安國，使使視之，蹇甚，乃更以平棘侯薛澤為丞相。

translations.literal: Tian zi yi zhi xiang, yu yong An guo, shi shi shi zhi, jian shen, nai geng yi Ping ji hou Xue Ze wei cheng xiang.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor discussed appoint chancellor, wanted use Anguo, sent envoy see him, lame severe, then changed with Pingji marquis Xue Ze as chancellor.

sentences.zh: 安國病免數月，蹇愈，上復以安國為中尉。

translations.literal: An guo bing mian shu yue, jian yu, shang fu yi An guo wei zhong wei.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo ill dismissed several months, lame cured, emperor again with Anguo as commandants.

sentences.zh: 歲餘，徙為衛尉。

translations.literal: Sui yu, xu wei wei wei.
translations.idiomatic: Year remainder, moved became guard wei.

sentences.zh: 車騎將軍衛青擊匈奴，出上谷，破胡蘢城。

translations.literal: Che qi jiang jun Wei Qing ji Xiong nu, chu Shang gu, po Hu Wei cheng.
translations.idiomatic: Chariot cavalry general Wei Qing attacked Xiongnu, out Shanggu, broke Hu Wei city.

sentences.zh: 將軍李廣為匈奴所得，復失之；

translations.literal: Jiang jun Li Guang wei Xiong nu suo de, fu shi zhi;
translations.idiomatic: General Li Guang by Xiongnu obtained, again lost him;

sentences.zh: 公孫敖大亡卒：皆當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Gong sun Ao da wang zu: jie dang zhan, shu wei shu ren.
translations.idiomatic: Gongsun Ao greatly lost soldiers: all should behead, redeemed as commoners.

sentences.zh: 明年，匈奴大入邊，殺遼西太守，及入鴈門，所殺略數千人。

translations.literal: Ming nian, Xiong nu da ru bian, sha Liao xi tai shou, ji ru Yan men, suo sha lve shu qian ren.
translations.idiomatic: Next year, Xiongnu greatly entered border, killed Liaoxi governor, and entered Yanmen, what killed plundered several thousand people.

sentences.zh: 車騎將軍衛青擊之，出鴈門。

translations.literal: Che qi jiang jun Wei Qing ji zhi, chu Yan men.
translations.idiomatic: Chariot cavalry general Wei Qing attacked them, out Yanmen.

sentences.zh: 衛尉安國為材官將軍，屯於漁陽。

translations.literal: Wei wei An guo wei cai guan jiang jun, tun yu Yu yang.
translations.idiomatic: Guard wei Anguo became material official general, garrisoned at Yuyang.

sentences.zh: 安國捕生虜，言匈奴遠去。

translations.literal: An guo bu sheng lu, yan Xiong nu yuan qu.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo captured living captives, spoke Xiongnu far gone.

sentences.zh: 即上書言方田作時，請且罷軍屯。

translations.literal: Ji shang shu yan fang tian zuo shi, qing qie ba jun tun.
translations.idiomatic: Immediately memorial spoke farming work time, requested temporarily dismiss army garrison.

sentences.zh: 罷軍屯月餘，匈奴大入上谷、漁陽。

translations.literal: Ba jun tun yue yu, Xiong nu da ru Shang gu, Yu yang.
translations.idiomatic: Dismissed army garrison month remainder, Xiongnu greatly entered Shanggu, Yuyang.

sentences.zh: 安國壁乃有七百餘人，出與戰，不勝，復入壁。

translations.literal: An guo bi nai you qi bai yu ren, chu yu zhan, bu sheng, fu ru bi.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo defensive wall then had seven hundred remainder people, out with battle, not win, again entered wall.

sentences.zh: 匈奴虜略千餘人及畜產而去。

translations.literal: Xiong nu lu lve qian yu ren ji chu chan er qu.
translations.idiomatic: Xiongnu captives plundered thousand remainder people and livestock produce and left.

sentences.zh: 天子聞之，怒，使使責讓安國。

translations.literal: Tian zi wen zhi, nu, shi shi ze rang An guo.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor heard it, angered, sent envoy blamed rebuked Anguo.

sentences.zh: 徒安國益東，屯右北平。

translations.literal: Tu An guo yi dong, tun You bei ping.
translations.idiomatic: Moved Anguo eastward more, garrisoned Youbeiping.

sentences.zh: 是時匈奴虜言當入東方。

translations.literal: Shi shi Xiong nu lu yan dang ru dong fang.
translations.idiomatic: At time Xiongnu captives spoke should enter eastern direction.

sentences.zh: 安國始為御史大夫及護軍，後稍斥疏，下遷；

translations.literal: An guo shi wei yu shi da fu ji hu jun, hou shao chi shu, xia qian;
translations.idiomatic: Anguo began became imperial censor and protect army, later gradually demoted distant, descended demoted;

sentences.zh: 而新幸壯將軍衛青等有功，益貴。

translations.literal: Er xin xing zhuang jiang jun Wei Qing deng you gong, yi gui.
translations.idiomatic: But newly favored vigorous generals Wei Qing etc. had merit, increasingly noble.

sentences.zh: 安國既疏遠，默默也；

translations.literal: An guo ji shu yuan, mo mo ye;
translations.idiomatic: Anguo already distant, silent;

sentences.zh: 將屯又為匈奴所欺，失亡多，甚自愧。

translations.literal: Jiang tun you wei Xiong nu suo qi, shi wang duo, shen zi kui.
translations.idiomatic: Army garrison moreover by Xiongnu deceived, lost perished many, very self ashamed.

sentences.zh: 幸得罷歸，乃益東徙屯，意忽忽不樂。

translations.literal: Xing de ba gui, nai yi dong xu tun, yi hu hu bu le.
translations.idiomatic: Fortunately obtained dismissed return, then increasingly eastward moved garrison, intention despondent not happy.

sentences.zh: 數月，病歐血死。

translations.literal: Shu yue, bing ou xue si.
translations.idiomatic: Several months, ill vomited blood died.

sentences.zh: 安國以元朔二年中卒。

translations.literal: An guo yi Yuan shuo er nian zhong zu.
translations.idiomatic: Anguo with Yuanshuo second year middle died.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余與壺遂定律歷，觀韓長孺之義，壺遂之深中隱厚。

translations.literal: Tai shi gong yue: Yu yu Hu Sui ding lv li, guan Han Chang ru zhi yi, Hu Sui zhi shen zhong yin hou.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Scribe said: I with Hu Sui determined law calendar, observed Han Changru righteousness, Hu Sui deep middle hidden generous.

sentences.zh: 世之言梁多長者，不虛哉！

translations.literal: Shi zhi yan Liang duo zhang zhe, bu xu zai!
translations.idiomatic: World speak Liang many elders, not false!

sentences.zh: 壺遂官至詹事，天子方倚以為漢相，會遂卒。

translations.literal: Hu Sui guan zhi Zhan shi, tian zi fang yi wei Han xiang, hui Sui zu.
translations.idiomatic: Hu Sui office reached director of palace affairs, emperor just relied to be Han chancellor, met Sui died.

sentences.zh: 不然，壺遂之內廉行修，斯鞠躬君子也。

translations.literal: Bu ran, Hu Sui zhi nei lian xing xiu, si ju gong jun zi ye.
translations.idiomatic: Not so, Hu Sui internal incorrupt conduct cultivated, this bowed gentleman.
